name: unwashed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not washed: His football shirt was left unwashed in his locker for weeks. Dangerous bacteria can be spread by unwashed hands. the great unwashed often humorous (US also the unwashed masses)
a humorous or insulting way to refer to ordinary, uneducated or poor people: He concocted a theory that great men are not bound by the same laws as the great unwashed.
